Articles.Content:
I\'ve been using Kerbal Space Program for a few months now and I felt that it was high time that I signed up for the forums.

I haven\'t bought it yet but I\'m going to within the next 10 days.

Anyway yes, nice to meet you all.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
